[Y]Interrupt Rhythm
[W]Periodic events for stable updates.
[c][m.]
[W]The CPC interrupt flow supports
[W]regular tasks such as music stepping
[W]and split timing checks.
[W]Keep handlers short and move heavy
[W]logic to the main loop using flags.
[c][m.]
[G]- Short handlers.
[G]- Shared state flags.
[G]- Predictable update cadence.
[m][m-]
[Y]PRACTICE
[C]Measure jitter before rewriting code
[C]paths.
[c][m.]
[C]0 MAIN   [W]# HELP
